channel.title: Daily's section and Spam section
channel.description:
As seeing people like to use the forum as "facebook" time to time, why not make a section where it's specifically sharing your day or an experience happening to you? People will argue "This forum isn't for sharing your personal life", Well true. However this is a community consisting of a vast majority of people connecting with people. ORR!! How about a stickied thread in the general discussion section for people wanting to share stuff like this?
Now for the spam section, a lot of people on the forum like to just post ignorant non meaning and troll shit for fun, this would save them a ban/mute.. a lot of other forums have this section i don't see why moparscape shouldn't. Oh and post count shouldn't be recorded in the spam section xD.
Post your guy's thoughts.

item.title: Daily's section and Spam section
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

abatssk8ter:

I don’t see why this is unreasonable.

A ‘spam’ or ‘daily’ section would generate tons of unneeded threads, from server advertisements to pornography, etc. Since post count would probably be disregarded in that section and it is a ‘spam’ section, staff won’t check it as often.

Read full topic

item.title: Daily's section and Spam section
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

I don’t see why this is unreasonable.

item.title: Daily's section and Spam section
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:8, topic:377751”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473638.msg3463244#msg3463244 date=1294695975]

[quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=473638.msg3463239#msg3463239 date=1294695648]

Been suggested; not happening.

That is what was said about the MineCraft board. Then in some time it was created.
[/quote]No, a Minecraft board had never been suggested before. The one that was suggested was a general gaming board, and it was flat out rejected.

[/quote]I suggested one. What are you on about ? :P[/quote]Yea, you suggested one, but no one had suggested it before that; that’s what I’m saying

Read full topic
